Appearance

Instant Windows & Office Activation

A reliable, open-source activation toolkit for Windows and Office, featuring HWID, KMS, Ohook, and more. Activate in under 40 seconds!

Get Started
View on Github

🔐 HWID Activation

Get a permanent digital license for Windows 10 & 11. Tied to your hardware, it survives reinstalls.

⚙️ KMS & Online KMS

Activate Windows and Office for 180 days, with an auto-renewal task for lifetime activation.

📦 Ohook & TSforge

Permanent, offline activation methods for various editions of Microsoft Office for windows 7 / 11
